group_1.narration: In the distant past, long into the future,@beyond the furthest reaches of the sky,@sits the goddess of all Magical Girls.
At the corner of the universe,@she listens to the sounds from@countless records spinning before her,@smiling gently all the while.
She watches over each and every Magical Girl,@while observing the first stirrings of the universe@and cheerful chatter of girls in the distant future.
She is aware of them all equally, as one,@with none drawing her attention alone.
